properties.name: restkv.multithreading.serviceThreads
properties.description: The number of threads to spawn for the pool of workers interacting with the key/value store.

properties.name: restkv.restParams.timeout
properties.description: The timeout, in milliseconds, when communicating with the key/value store.

properties.name: restkv.restParams.maxValueLength
properties.description: The maximum length (in characters/bytes) acceptable for values in the key/value store.

properties.name: restkv.restParams.contentType
properties.description: The default HTTP content type to return in the headers of responses.

properties.name: restkv.restParams.debug
properties.description: Whether the REST interface should run in debug mode (if true, will output a full stack trace on internal server errors).
